name: Transformation Scroll (Vagabond Wolf)
description: Use it to transform into Vagabond Wolf for a while. Attention! The effect will vanish when mounted or dead. This item can’t be canceled once unsealed.

name: Transformation Scroll Chest
description: Reward for Fabre Fight. A magic chest that contains one transformation scroll.

name: Transparent Head Protector
description: A round dome that protects the head. It's made of magic materials and allows the wearer to breathe, unlike one made of other materials.
